data.name: MORODASHI SUMO - Unlock All Accessory + Special Accessory
data.detailed_description:
If you purchase this DLC, you will be able to select the option to release all the accessories that can be used for avatar editing, and you will also get "Special accessories for DLC (27 types in total)".
This DLC is recommended for those who want to use all accessories immediately.
* Accessories other than "special accessories for DLC" can also be released by accumulating in-game currency.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
